docs.lead_paragraph: The retailer, which is the United States’ largest grocer, will try to reduce adverse environmental impacts of the food it sells.

headline.main: Walmart Aims to Go Greener on Food
headline.print_headline: Walmart Aims to Go Greener on Food

docs.abstract: Walmart announces initiative to reduce adverse environmental impacts of the food it sells and to help customers improve nutrition in their diets.

headline.main: When Gluten Sensitivity Isn't Celiac Disease

docs.abstract: A growing body of research indicates that many people who react to gluten may be suffering a condition called non-celiac gluten sensitivity, or NCGS.
docs.snippet: A growing body of research indicates that many people who react to gluten may be suffering a condition called non-celiac gluten sensitivity, or NCGS.

docs.lead_paragraph: BERNSTEIN--Lewis H., passed away suddenly on September 22, 2014 surrounded by those who loved him. Cherished son of the late Tillie (nee Friedman) and Ralph Bernstein, brother of the late Vivian Blackman. Born April 27, 1935 in Brooklyn, NY, he was a graduate of Columbia College with an MBA from Columbia University. He was a founder of the Gerald J and Dorothy R Friedman New York Foundation for Medical Research serving as an officer on its Board of Directors for 18 years. Instrumental in establishing the Friedman Diabetes Institute at Beth Israel Medical Center now part of Mount Sinai, the Friedman School of Nutrition Science and Policy at Tufts University, the international Friedman Fellows Program. He also helped to name Manhattan Theater Club's Samuel J Friedman Theater on Broadway. Prior to that he was a leading buyer of men's clothing at Federated Department Stores and President of Metro Wholesale Corporation and Eton Gifts Ltd. He is survived by George Serrano, his husband and partner of 46 years, cousins Dorothy and Jane Friedman of New York, sisters and brothers-in-law Luz Maria, Hector Ruiz, Maria Bassett Serrano, their children, grandchildren and by many cousins in the United States, the United Kingdom and Israel. He is lovingly remembered by his cherished friends, David Golante, Sandra D. O'Connor, Edwin Hydeman and Maxine Ostrow. A sweet, kind, gentle soul, a brilliant and generous man, Lew will be forever in the hearts of his family and friends. A memorial service will be scheduled at a later date.

docs.lead_paragraph: A tax on sodas and other sugar-laden drinks that voters and courts in other parts of the country have rejected is on the November ballots in San Francisco and Berkeley, two cities that have been open to such social-engineering initiatives in the past.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mrs. Obama, unlike Hillary Rodham Clinton in 1998, will keep to a fairly limited path as she stumps for candidates, some of whom are trying to distance themselves from the president.

headline.main: Why Is First Lady Scarce in Campaign? Her Last Name Is Obama
headline.print_headline: Why Is First Lady Scarce in Campaign? Her Last Name Is Obama

docs.abstract: Michelle Obama is emerging to rally votes, after being largely absent from campaign trail; Obama, unlike Hillary Rodham Clinton in 1998, will keep to fairly limited path as she stumps for candidates, some of whom are trying to distance themselves from Pres Obama.
docs.snippet: Mrs. Obama, unlike Hillary Rodham Clinton in 1998, will keep to a fairly limited path as she stumps for candidates, some of whom are trying to distance themselves from the president.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Justice Department has opened a criminal investigation into what happened to a mentally ill inmate in North Carolina who was found dead from dehydration after a prison transfer in March, grand jury subpoena records show.

headline.main: Justice Department to Probe North Carolina Inmate's Dehydration Death
headline.print_headline: Justice Department to Probe North Carolina Inmate's Dehydration Death

docs.snippet: The U.S. Justice Department has opened a criminal investigation into what happened to a mentally ill inmate in North Carolina who was found dead from dehydration after a prison transfer in March, grand jury subpoena records show.
